title: Ep 293 Frankly Speaking: Vringo, Apple, STMicroelectonics and the Economy
itunes:title: Frankly Speaking: Vringo, Apple, STMicroelectonics and the Economy
description:
We start off today with a question about a few stocks that were in Frank’s old portfolio. Frank recaps the story behind his recommendation on Vringo.
Frank talks a video that circulating around the Internet about ;
Amazon, Apple, Google and Facebook.
He recaps his research on STMicroelectronics and why he likes this sector and especially this sensor company. 
And Rob asks Frank a question that prompts him to talk about how he formulates his overall economic and market view.
Please send in your questions  
Plus, Franks brand new website is live at  and his new newsletter Disrupters and Dominators has launched.  to learn more about it.
content:encoded:
We start off today with a question about a few stocks that were in Frank’s old portfolio. Frank recaps the story behind his recommendation on Vringo.
